reference.detail: Taylor J.G.V., private communication (1975) superseded by Rutledge A.R. Smith L.V, Merritt JS., AECL report 6692 (1980)
Taylor J.G.V., private communication (1975) superseded by Rutledge A.R. Smith L.V, Merritt JS., AECL report 6692 (1980)

Mesurement.Comments: The activity of 2439.1~kBq is used. It corresponds to the arithmetic mean of both results. The relative uncertainty of 0.35\% is used. It corresponds to the higher value of both results.
The activity of 2439.1~kBq is used. It corresponds to the arithmetic mean of both results. The relative uncertainty of 0.35\% is used. It corresponds to the higher value of both results.
The ampoule measured by the NMIJ was used to make the link of the APMP.RI(II)-K2 comparison to the SIR.
Weighted mean result taking correlation into account for the uncertainties
Weighted mean result taking correlation into account for the uncertainties
